data.title: Ivan The Terrible Biography, Birthday. Awards & Facts About Ivan The Terrible
data.meta_description: Ivan The Terrible detail biography, family, facts and date of birth. Awards of Ivan The Terrible, birthday, children and many other facts. See Ivan The Terrible's spouse, children, sibling and parent names.
data.text:
Introduction:

Ivan IV Vasilyevich, also known as Ivan the Terrible or Ivan the Fearsome, was the first tsar of Russia. Check out this biography to know about his childhood, family, personal life, timeline, etc.

Nationality Russian

Famous as

First Russian Tsar

Fyodor Dostoevsky

Russian novelist

Fyodor Dostoevsky was a Russian philosopher and novelist best known for the work ‘Crime and Punishment’. This biography of Fyodor Dostoevsky provides detailed information about his childhood, life, achievements, works & timeline.

Born: 11 November 1821 Russian

Paul I Of Russia

Russian Emperor 1796-1801

Emperor Paul I ruled Russia for a short span of five years from 1796 to 1801. This biography profiles his childhood, family, life history, relations with his mother Catherine II the Great, achievements and other facts.

Born: 01 October 1754 Russian

Peter The Great

First Emperor of Russia

Peter the Great was the Tsar and first Emperor of Russia known for his extensive expansion and reforms. This biography of Peter the Great provides detailed information about his childhood, life, achievements, works & timeline

Born: 09 June 1672 Russian

Leon Trotsky

Founder and first leader of the Red Army

Leon Trotsky was a Russian politician, a Marxist revolutionary and the founder and the first leader of the Red Army. To know more about this man, biography, profile, childhood, life & timeline, read on.

Born: 07 November 1879 Russian

Catherine The Great

Catherine the Great was the longest ruling female leader of Russia whose reign was called Russia’s Golden Age. This biography of Catherine the Great provides detailed information about her childhood, life, achievements, works & timeline.

Born: 02 May 1729 Russian

Leo Tolstoy

Leo Tolstoy was one of the most acclaimed Russian writers, who wrote the famous ‘War and Peace’ and ‘Anna Karenina’. This biography gives detailed information about his childhood, life, works & timeline.

Born: 09 September 1828 Russian

Boris Yeltsin

Boris Yeltsin was the first President of Russian Federation. With this biography, explore the childhood, life, profile and timeline of this prominent politician.

Born: 01 February 1931 Russian

Anna Kournikova

Tennis Star

Anna Kournikova is a retired Russian professional tennis player. This biography provides detailed information about her childhood, life, achievements, career and timeline.

Born: 07 June 1981 Russian

Yuri Gagarin

Soviet Cosmonaut

Yuri Gagarin was a famous Russian cosmonaut and the first man to enter space and orbit the Earth, on the ‘Vostok 1.’ Check out this biography to know more about his childhood, family, achievements, etc.

Born: 09 March 1934 Russian

Maria Sharapova

Maria Sharapova is a world renowned professional tennis player. Check out this biography to know about her childhood, life, achievements, works & timeline.

Born: 19 April 1987 Russian

Yul Brynner

Film & Stage Actor

Yul Brynner was one of the most talented actors and directors of the early 20th century. This biography profiles his childhood, life, career, achievements and timeline.

Born: 11 July 1920 Russian

Irina Shayk

Irina Shayk is a famous Russian model and actress. Check out this biography to know about her childhood, family life, achievements and other facts about her life.

Born: 06 January 1986 Russian

Vladimir Putin

President of Russia

Vladimir Putin is the current President of Russia. This biography provides detailed information about his childhood, profile, career and timeline

Born: 07 October 1952 Russian

Nikita Khrushchev

Nikita Khrushchev was a former Soviet premier. This biography gives detailed information about his childhood, life, achievements and timeline.

Born: 15 April 1894 Russian

Grigori Rasputin

Peasant

Rasputin was a Russian farmer-turned-healer, famous for his relationship with the Tsar’s family. This biography provides detailed information about his childhood, profile, career and timeline

Born: 21 January 1869 Russian

Mikhail Gorbachev

Mikhail Gorbachev, a Nobel Peace Prize winner, is one of the notable leaders of former Soviet Union. Read this brief biography to find more on his life.

Born: 02 March 1931 Russian

Vladimir Lenin

Vladimir Lenin was a communist revolutionary who led the famous October revolution in Russia. Find more information on life of Lenin in this brief biography.

Born: 22 April 1870 Russian
